description: A play on words between 'chili' the food and feeling chilly.
title: Chili Warmth
n_1: Carlos and Luisa shiver in the winter breeze.
c2_1: Don't worry, I have the perfect thing.
n_2: Luisa reveals a pot of steaming chili.
c2_2: Yes, it's our secret to staying warm!
n_3: They enjoy the chili, laughing together.
c2_3: Told you we don't get cold.
n_4: Carlos finally understands the warmth of chili.
c1_4: Now I get why we never feel chilly!
